website_summaries.verdict: An exceptionally-rated tan extender for those looking to extend the span of a sunless tan for a few weeks.
pros: Most of the ingredients are organic for healthy skincare
Adds bronze coloration to sunless tans
cons: Customers wish this product extended their tan longer than a week

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled old and yucky and will never buy again...I read it had a great odor, on and on-not true. I cannot stand to get near it and am considering throwing it out-waste of money and time and don't think it even worked. A big "no" from me...I use all kinds and try lots of product and this one isn't one at all. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dennydimples

customer_reviews.title: Barely any color for gradual tanning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a natural gradual tanner. It kind of does the job. I apply a nice layer once every day and barely see any results. I'm fair-skinned so any type of tanning product shows up on my skin after a day or two. This is VERY subtle. I do like that it has more natural ingredients than all the junk in Jergens and other gradual self tanners, so I'm thankful for that. I just wish I got a deeper color out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Tan Extender doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I used this tan extender last week while on vacation with the hopes of extending my spray tan. It did not work at all, the tan still faded as quickly as without an extender, and I did not see any new gradual color developing, which I expected since it has a small amount of DHA. The cheap Jergens stuff works better than this and is half the price. Also the lotion did not rub in well and had a scent that wasn't that great (like candy).
customer_reviews.author: Nitrousange

customer_reviews.title: I think it works. Spreads better if combined with another lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several bottles of this. I think it works. Pro tip: The lotion spreads better if combined with another lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Possibly already used bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received my bottle and nearly half of the product was gone. It wasn’t a full bottle. There also wasn’t a seal but I’m not sure if there usually is because this was my first time purchasing this product. Disappointed because this wasn’t cheap and exchanging would take another month + to receive because of covid delays. Overall regret this Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: It truly does extend your tan, and looks so natural!! I love their products!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Molly

customer_reviews.title: New formula!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Skinerals self tanners and I've been using the Amber Glow for a few months. I noticed that my last bottle was a little bittle different and it seems like they've upgraded their formula. I have to say that it's way better! I like the smell and it keeps my self tan darker even longer. Good call, Skinerals!
customer_reviews.author: Bourgoin

customer_reviews.title: Tan doesn't sweat off
customer_reviews.text: I workout most days and although I love the look of self tanner on my skin, I think all of my sweat makes the tan wear off faster. I recently started using the Skinerals Amber Glow every other day and it's made a huge difference. My tan looks fresh and even for days, now. I can't believe I didn't think about doing this before.
customer_reviews.author: Fremeau

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a pleasant smell and did nothing for my tan.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a pleasant smell and did nothing for my tan.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for extending an already e siting tan.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tan extenders on the market. I have a tanning bed that I use on a regular basis. However, I also travel a lot and miss out using my tanning bed, so I use Skinerals Self Tanner Extender Lotion to get me through and keep my tan looking fresh. It works great to extend an already tan, but not for trying to get a quick fake take for a special occasion. So used for what the product is men for will give you 100% satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Aitken

customer_reviews.title: My favorite self tanner thus far.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tanner. Great color & doesn’t make my ankles and wrists look crazy. Dries in Good timing but not so fast that you can’t blend. Would recommend over Loving Tan any day.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find a body lotion that helps to lengthen your sunless tanner but unfortunately I was not able to use it because I am ill and the scent made me nauseous. I think it has good consistency-not too runny and not real thick. I think others will love it but I cannot.

customer_reviews.title: Great tan extender lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! Not only does it have a great smell to it, it absorbs quickly & adds a little extra color to my sunless when it starts to fade :)

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold in moisture very well. Going back to cetaphil.
customer_reviews.author: annacatmc

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It definitely works and I can’t wait to purchase the entire line of skinerals products.
customer_reviews.author: adm2370

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Such a nice bronze glow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using the St. Moriz Tanner for years. I just wanted to try something new and I was not disappointed! This tan made me very glowy and bronzy without making me look orange. My skin is normally very pale with a warm undertone and it made me look great! It was really easy to put on (I bought the Skinerals mitt to go with it) and I had no issues with the color guard! It was easy to see if I missed any spots and was super easy to fix. It dried pretty quickly and the scent wasn't too bad! I waited about 8 hours before washing it off in the shower. Will definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda h

customer_reviews.title: Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: The color is great but as other reviews stated it washes off after every shower to the point you can barely tell a difference. It’s a lengthy process before initially applying the product so more than likely I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Toni-Rai Pitre

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny- you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Beautiful color- long lasting amd no smell. Buy rhe mitt and be careful around knees and elbows. Selling my full bottles of St Tropez. No desire to ever suntan again.

EXTENDED TAN LIFE: It is the perfect complement to any self-tanner, such as the Californium and Onyx Sunless Tanning Mousses, keeping your gorgeous fake tan fresh for longer.

WHOLE BODY MOISTURIZER: This sulfate- and paraben-free formula applies smoothly onto the skin and won't strip your tan like other moisturizers. It safely moisturizers your skin while extending the life of your sunless tan.
PURE NATURAL BLENDS: Amber Glow is free of nuts and oils; This is a proudly USA-made cruelty-free, sulfate-free, paraben-free, and vegan tan extending lotion.

NATURAL SKIN SOLUTIONS: Skinerals is dedicated to helping you get back the beauty you were born with; We use hundreds of different minerals and earth elements to promote healthy cell development, providing relief from many skin and hair conditions.
